title: Bug 17373create getter/setter  getter javadoc text [code manipulation]
description: Bug 17373create getter/settergetter javadoc text [code manipulation] The getter javadoc says:/Gets the name. @return returns the name /I'm not sure about the second line, but I feel strongly about the first line.Also, I think the param lines should start with lower case letters.
OB: @return Returns a string /It should be:/Returns the name.
EB: @return Returns a string /It should be:/Returns the name.
